接口 IOFMessageListener

  • 所有超级接口:

      IListener.Command receive(IOFSwitch sw, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg, FloodlightContext cntx)
      This is the method Floodlight uses to call listeners with OpenFlow messages

      • 从接口继承的方法 net.floodlightcontroller.core.IListener

        getName, isCallbackOrderingPostreq, isCallbackOrderingPrereq

    • 方法详细资料

      • receive

        IListener.Command receive(IOFSwitch sw,
                          org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg,
                          FloodlightContext cntx)
        This is the method Floodlight uses to call listeners with OpenFlow messages
        参数:
        sw - the OpenFlow switch that sent this message
        msg - the message
        cntx - a Floodlight message context object you can use to pass information between listeners
        返回:
        the command to continue or stop the execution
